triples.name: DBSCAN
triples.relevance: The paper proposes empirical performance analysis and characterization of DBSCAN algorithm on different dataset types with non-uniform density.

triples.name: Cluster analysis
triples.relevance: The paper focuses on clustering analysis as the primary analytical task to be performed on datasets.

triples.name: Data mining
triples.relevance: Clustering technology has important applications in data mining, which is one of the key fields where the paper's work applies.

triples.name: Pattern recognition
triples.relevance: Clustering technology has important applications in pattern recognition, a key application domain mentioned in the paper.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Clustering technology has important applications in machine learning, which is a primary field of application for clustering algorithms.
